name: UpdateWebhookSubscription
description:
Update a webhook subscription to modify its settings.

This tool is used to update an existing webhook subscription by providing necessary changes to its settings. It should be called when there's a need to modify the webhook's parameters or configuration.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the subscription to update. This is required to identify the webhook subscription that needs to be modified.

value_schema.description: [REQUIRED] The ID of the [Subscription](entity:WebhookSubscription) to update.

parameters.name: subscription_unique_id
parameters.description: A Square-generated unique ID for the webhook subscription to be updated. This is required to identify which subscription to modify.

value_schema.description: A Square-generated unique ID for the subscription.

parameters.name: subscription_name
parameters.description: The new name for the webhook subscription to update.

value_schema.description: The name of this subscription.

parameters.name: event_types
parameters.description: An array of event types associated with this subscription that trigger the webhook.

value_schema.description: The event types associated with this subscription.

parameters.name: webhook_notification_url
parameters.description: The URL to which webhooks are sent. Must be a valid URL that can receive POST requests.

value_schema.description: The URL to which webhooks are sent.

parameters.name: api_version_of_subscription
parameters.description: Specify the API version for the subscription. Optional for creation and defaults to the application's API version if not provided.

value_schema.description:
The API version of the subscription.
This field is optional for `CreateWebhookSubscription`. 
The value defaults to the API version used by the application.

parameters.name: signature_key
parameters.description: The Square-generated signature key for validating the webhook origin.

value_schema.description: The Square-generated signature key used to validate the origin of the webhook event.

parameters.name: subscription_created_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp indicating when the subscription was created, formatted in RFC 3339.

value_schema.description: The timestamp of when the subscription was created, in RFC 3339 format. For example, "2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z".

parameters.name: updated_at_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp of the last update for the subscription, in RFC 3339 format (e.g., "2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z").

value_schema.description:
The timestamp of when the subscription was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.
For example, "2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z".

parameters.name: subscription_enabled
parameters.description: Set to `true` to enable the subscription or `false` to disable it.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether the subscription is enabled (`true`) or not (`false`).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.
